project.description: This job submits packages from the "staging" subproject of an OBS/IBS project to the main project. Only packages that built successfully are submitted.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: project
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the main project that should be updated with packages from its staging project.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: subproject
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the subproject that acts as staging project.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# DEBUG MODE with E=echo # NORMAL MODE with E= E= #==========================
case $subproject in None) echo "No valid 'subproject' provided - defaults for safety reasons to 'None'" exit 1 ;; "-") echo "Subproject set to '-': skip job, do not fail (eg. for Master project)" exit 0 ;; esac
export BS=OBS case $BS in OBS) OSC="osc -A https://api.opensuse.org" ;; IBS) OSC="osc -A https://api.suse.de" ;; esac
COS=$project COSS=$COS:$subproject export BS_CHECKOUT=/home/jenkins/${BS}_CHECKOUT/$COSS submitcmd="echo no submit for project=$project" OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP2
case $project in Devel:Cloud:1.0) submitcmd="$OSC submitrequest" ;; Devel:Cloud:2.[05]) submitcmd="$OSC copypac -K -e" OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP3 ;; Cloud:OpenStack:[EF]*) submitcmd="$OSC copypac -K -e" ;; Cloud:OpenStack:[GH]*) submitcmd="$OSC copypac -K -e" OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP3 ;; isv:SUSE:Cloud:2.[05]) submitcmd="$OSC copypac -K -e" ;; *) echo "Please add support for the project: $project" exit 1 ;; esac
for COMPONENT in `$OSC ls $COSS 2>/dev/null` do cd $BS_CHECKOUT || exit 1 if [ ! -d $COMPONENT ]; then osc co $COMPONENT || exit 1 fi cd $COMPONENT || exit 1
grep -q "<linkinfo" .osc/_files || exit 2
if $OSC rdiff $COS $COMPONENT $COSS | grep . && $OSC api /build/$COSS/$OSCBUILDDIST/x86_64/$COMPONENT/_status | grep -q 'code="succeeded"' then $E $submitcmd $COSS $COMPONENT $COS fi done
